data.headline: Senior Product Manager with Startup Experience
data.summary: Experienced Product Manager with a proven track record of delivering successful products in fast-paced startup environments. Skilled in agile methodologies, user research, and cross-functional collaboration. Passionate about creating innovative solutions that meet customer needs.

experience.title: Senior Product Manager
bullets: Spearheaded the development and launch of three successful products, driving user growth and revenue by 30% within the first year.
Collaborated cross-functionally with engineering, design, and marketing teams to define product roadmaps and deliver high-quality solutions.
Conducted user research, analyzed data, and implemented feature improvements to enhance the user experience.
Managed the product backlog, prioritized features, and ensured timely delivery of releases.

experience.title: Product Manager
bullets: Spearheaded the development and launch of a new mobile app, leading to a 25% increase in user engagement.
Collaborated with the engineering team to implement Agile methodologies, improving development efficiency and product quality.
Conducted user testing and market research to identify customer pain points and inform product roadmap decisions.
Presented product updates and performance metrics to executive stakeholders, securing additional funding for product initiatives.

projects.name: Acme Startup Mobile App
projects.description: Developed and launched a mobile app for Acme Startup, driving a 25% increase in user engagement.

projects.name: Omega Tech Product Roadmap
projects.description: Defined and executed the product roadmap for Omega Tech's flagship software, leading to a 30% increase in revenue.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. The photo should show Katharina Weber, a senior product manager with a friendly and approachable expression. She should be dressed in business casual attire, such as a blouse and blazer, against a plain background.
